pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Profile Analysis // R functions for criterion profile analysis, Davison and Davenport (2002) doi:10.1037/1082-989X.7.4.468 and meta-analytic criterion profile analysis, Wiernik, Wilmot, Davison, and Ones (2020) doi:10.1037/met0000305. Sensitivity analyses to aid in interpreting criterion profile analysis results are also included.
